thread.title: Stubborn swan causes chaos on M27
thread.title_full: Stubborn swan causes chaos on M27 | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Stubborn swan causes chaos on M27
text:
Officers corner the swan on the M27 Credit: Highways England If you were stuck on traffic on the M27 in Hampshire this morning, then the culprit may have been a stubborn swan.
Two lanes were closed on the eastbound carriageway at junction 11 near Fareham, while officers chased the bird.
The swan attempted to fly away - but failed Credit: Highways England Traffic built during rush hour between junctions 9 and 11 as the swan managed to evade capture by the police.
It failed in an attempt to fly away before being safely removed from the motorway.
Last updated Tue 21 Feb 2017 Hampshire & Isle of Wight
